TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class AddInBase : IDisposable, Microsoft.Office.Tools.IAddInExtension, System.ComponentModel.IComponent, System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize, System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent

.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit AddInBase extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.Office.Tools.EntryPoint, class Microsoft.Office.Tools.IAddInExtension, class Microsoft.Office.Tools.IExtension, class System.ComponentModel.IComponent, class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize, class System.IDisposable, class System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent

summary.span: 为使用 Visual Studio 创建的应用程序级外接程序中的 ThisAddIn 类提供基类。

span.span: Provides the base class for the ThisAddIn class in application-level add-ins that you create by using Visual Studio.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供通过使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建的所有外接程序所共享的功能。The class provides functionality that is shared by all add-ins that you create by using the Office development tools in Visual Studio. 外`ThisAddIn`接程序项目中的类从类派生其大多数成员。The `ThisAddIn` class in add-in projects derives most of its members from the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Programming VSTO Add-Ins](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins)。For more information, see [Programming VSTO Add-Ins](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins). ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net4utilities](~/includes/vsto-net4utilities-md.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected AddInBase (Microsoft.Office.Tools.Factory factory, IServiceProvider serviceProvider, string primaryCookie, string identifier);

.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Factory factory, class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider, string primaryCookie, string identifier) cil managed

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能以编程方式创建宿主项。You cannot create host items programmatically. 而应使用在`ThisAddIn`外接程序项目中自动创建的类。Instead, use the `ThisAddIn` class that is automatically created in your add-in project. `ThisAddIn` 类派生自 。The `ThisAddIn` class derives from . 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Programming VSTO Add-Ins](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins)。For more information, see [Programming VSTO Add-Ins](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins).

summary.span: 获取此 对象扩展的 对象。

span.span: Gets the object that this object extends.

value.span: 此 对象扩展的对象。

span.span: The object that this object extends.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类通过 实现接口来扩展对象。 The class extends objects by implementing the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void BeginInit() cil managed
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility CreateRibbonExtensibilityObject() cil managed

summary.span: 返回实现 Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility 接口的对象。

span.span: Returns an object that implements the Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility interface.
An object that implements the Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写此方法, 以向 Microsoft Office 应用程序提供`Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility`接口的实现, 或者如果你在项目中有多个功能区, 并且想要指定要在运行时显示的功能区, 则为。Override this method to provide the Microsoft Office application an implementation of the `Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility` interface, or if you have multiple Ribbons in your project and you want to specify which Ribbons to display at run time. 您不必重写此方法即可返回通过使用 "**功能区 (可视化设计器)** " 项模板添加到项目中的功能区。You do not have to override this method to return Ribbons that you add to the project by using the **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item template. 默认情况下, 此方法返回一个对象, 该对象表示项目中的所有 "**功能区 (可视化设计器)** " 项。By default, this method returns a object that represents all **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** items in the project. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[功能区概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-overview). 您必须重写或方法才能在您的项目中返回通过使用 "**功能区 (XML)** " 项模板添加的功能区。You must override the or method to return Ribbons in your project that you add by using the **Ribbon (XML)** item template. 有关如何重写方法的详细信息, 请参阅[功能区 XML](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-xml)。For more information about how to override the method, see [Ribbon XML](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-xml). 有关如何重写方法的详细信息, 请参阅[使用扩展性接口自定义 UI 功能](/visualstudio/vsto/customizing-ui-features-by-using-extensibility-interfaces)。For more information about how to override the method, see [Customizing UI Features By Using Extensibility Interfaces](/visualstudio/vsto/customizing-ui-features-by-using-extensibility-interfaces).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.IRibbonExtension[] CreateRibbonObjects() cil managed

summary.span: 将 对象的数组返回给 方法。

span.span: Returns an array of objects to the method.

summary.span: 表示“功能区”要显示运行时间的对象。

span.span: The objects represent the Ribbons to display at run time.

returns.span: 表示运行时显示的功能区的 对象的数组。

span.span: An array of objects that represent the Ribbons to display at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当项目包含 **功能区 (可视化设计器)** 项时, 类的方法的默认实现将调用此方法。This method is called by the default implementation of the method of the class when the project contains **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** items. 如果要指定要在运行时显示的功能区, 请重写此方法。Override this method if you want to specify which Ribbons to display at run time. 还可以重写方法, 以指定要在运行时显示的功能区。You can also override the method to specify which Ribbons to display at run time. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[功能区概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-overview).

summary.span: 释放由 占用的资源。

span.span: Releases the resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不要自己调用方法。Do not call the method yourself. 卸载外接程序时, 将清理外[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]接程序使用的所有资源。When the add-in is unloaded, the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] cleans up all resources used by the add-in. 有关方法的详细信息, 请参阅[清理非托管资源](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a17b0066-71c2-4ba4-9822-8e19332fc213)。For more information about the method, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a17b0066-71c2-4ba4-9822-8e19332fc213).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnShutdown() cil managed

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在卸载外接程序前运行代码, 请将代码添加到`ThisAddIn_Shutdown` `ThisAddIn`类中的方法。To run code just before the add-in is unloaded, add code to the `ThisAddIn_Shutdown` method in the `ThisAddIn` class. 此方法是事件的默认事件处理程序。This method is a default event handler for the event. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Events in Office Projects](/visualstudio/vsto/events-in-office-projects)。For more information, see [Events in Office Projects](/visualstudio/vsto/events-in-office-projects). 有关`ThisAddIn`类的详细信息, 请参阅[VSTO 外接程序编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins)。For more information about the `ThisAddIn` class, see [Programming VSTO Add-Ins](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnStartup() cil managed

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在加载外接程序时运行代码, 请将代码添加`ThisAddIn_Startup`到`ThisAddIn`类中的方法。To run code when the add-in is loaded, add code to the `ThisAddIn_Startup` method in the `ThisAddIn` class. 此方法是事件的默认事件处理程序。This method is a default event handler for the event. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Events in Office Projects](/visualstudio/vsto/events-in-office-projects)。For more information, see [Events in Office Projects](/visualstudio/vsto/events-in-office-projects). 有关`ThisAddIn`类的详细信息, 请参阅[VSTO 外接程序编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins)。For more information about the `ThisAddIn` class, see [Programming VSTO Add-Ins](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance object RequestComAddInAutomationService() cil managed

summary.span: 返回您的外接程序中可以供其他解决方案使用的对象。

span.span: Returns an object in your add-in that can be used by other solutions.

returns.span: 要向其他解决方案公开的对象。

span.span: An object that you want to expose to other solutions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写此方法, 以向其他解决方案公开外接程序中的对象。Override this method to expose an object in your add-in to other solutions. 这包括在相同的应用程序进程中运行的其他外接程序和文档级自定义项、VBA 代码和外部自动化代码。This includes other add-ins and document-level customizations running in the same application process, VBA code, and external automation code. 返回的对象必须是公共的, 它必须对 COM 可见, 并且必须公开[IDispatch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5)接口。The object that you return must be public, it must be visible to COM, and it must expose the [IDispatch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5) interface. 如果返回的对象不满足这些要求, [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]则将在调用实现后引发。If the object you return does not meet these requirements, the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] will throw an after it calls your implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Calling Code in VSTO Add-ins from Other Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/calling-code-in-vsto-add-ins-from-other-office-solutions)。For more information, see [Calling Code in VSTO Add-ins from Other Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/calling-code-in-vsto-add-ins-from-other-office-solutions). ## Examples 有关演示如何重写方法的代码示例, 请参阅[演练:从 VBA](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-calling-code-in-a-vsto-add-in-from-vba)调用 VSTO 外接程序中的代码。For a code example that demonstrates how to override the method, see [Walkthrough: Calling Code in a VSTO Add-in from VBA](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-calling-code-in-a-vsto-add-in-from-vba).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance object RequestService(valuetype System.Guid serviceGuid) cil managed

param.name: serviceGuid
param.span: 一个 ，用于标识 Microsoft Office 应用程序支持的扩展性接口。

span.span: A that identifies an extensibility interface that is supported by Microsoft Office applications.

summary.span: 返回一个对象，该对象可扩展 Microsoft Office 应用程序中的一个功能。

span.span: Returns an object that extends a feature in a Microsoft Office application.

returns.span: 一个对象，可实现由 标识的扩展性接口。

span.span: An object that implements the extensibility interface that is identified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在应用程序级外接程序中重写此方法, 以实现可扩展 Microsoft Office 应用程序中的功能的扩展性接口。Override this method in an application-level add-in to implement an extensibility interface that extends a feature in a Microsoft Office application. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Customizing UI Features By Using Extensibility Interfaces](/visualstudio/vsto/customizing-ui-features-by-using-extensibility-interfaces)。For more information, see [Customizing UI Features By Using Extensibility Interfaces](/visualstudio/vsto/customizing-ui-features-by-using-extensibility-interfaces). 重写此方法时, 请检查`serviceGuid`参数的值以确定请求的扩展性接口, 然后返回实现接口的对象。When you override this method, check the value of the `serviceGuid` parameter to determine which extensibility interface is being requested, and then return an object that implements the interface. 加载外接程序时, 将[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]对应用程序支持的每个接口调用一次或多次, 并将返回值发送到正在加载外接程序的 Microsoft Office 应用程序。When your add-in is loaded, the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] calls one or more times for each interface that is supported by the application, and it sends the return value to the Microsoft Office application that is loading your add-in. 有关外接程序加载过程的详细信息, 请参阅[VSTO 外接程序的体系结构](/visualstudio/vsto/architecture-of-vsto-add-ins)。For more information about the load process of add-ins, see [Architecture of VSTO Add-ins](/visualstudio/vsto/architecture-of-vsto-add-ins). > [!NOTE] > 如果要通过创建自己`Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility`的接口实现或通过向项目添加**功能区 (XML)** 项来自定义功能区 UI, 则可以改为重写方法, 而不是方法。If you are customizing the Ribbon UI by creating your own implementation of the `Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility` interface or by adding a **Ribbon (XML)** item to your project, you can alternatively override the method instead of the method. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[功能区概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-overview)和[功能区 XML](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-xml)。For more information, see [Ribbon Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-overview) and [Ribbon XML](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-xml). ## Examples 有关演示如何实现扩展性接口并重写方法的代码示例, 请参阅[使用扩展性接口自定义 UI 功能](/visualstudio/vsto/customizing-ui-features-by-using-extensibility-interfaces)。For a code example that demonstrates how to implement an extensibility interface and override the method, see [Customizing UI Features By Using Extensibility Interfaces](/visualstudio/vsto/customizing-ui-features-by-using-extensibility-interfaces).

summary.span: 当外接程序即将卸载时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the add-in is about to be unloaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类`ThisAddIn`中的默认事件处理程序, 而不是为此事件创建自己的事件处理程序。Use the default event handler in the `ThisAddIn` class, instead of creating your own event handler for this event. 默认事件处理程序命名为`ThisAddIn_Shutdown`。The default event handler is named `ThisAddIn_Shutdown`. 在 outlook 2010 中, 当 outlook 退出时不引发该事件。In Outlook 2010, the event is not raised when Outlook exits. 但是, 当用户通过使用 Outlook 中的**COM 外**接程序对话框禁用外接程序时, 将引发此事件。However, this event is raised when the user disables the add-in by using the **COM Add-ins** dialog box in Outlook. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Events in Office Projects](/visualstudio/vsto/events-in-office-projects)。For more information, see [Events in Office Projects](/visualstudio/vsto/events-in-office-projects). 有关`ThisAddIn`类的详细信息, 请参阅[VSTO 外接程序编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins)。For more information about the `ThisAddIn` class, see [Programming VSTO Add-Ins](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins).

summary.span: 在加载外接程序、且程序集中的所有初始化代码都已运行时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the add-in is loaded, after all the initialization code in the assembly has run.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类`ThisAddIn`中的默认事件处理程序, 而不是为此事件创建自己的事件处理程序。Use the default event handler in the `ThisAddIn` class, instead of creating your own event handler for this event. 默认事件处理程序命名为`ThisAddIn_Startup`。The default event handler is named `ThisAddIn_Startup`. 有关的详细信息, 请参阅[Office 项目中的事件](/visualstudio/vsto/events-in-office-projects)。For more information about, see [Events in Office Projects](/visualstudio/vsto/events-in-office-projects). 有关`ThisAddIn`类的详细信息, 请参阅[VSTO 外接程序编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins)。For more information about the `ThisAddIn` class, see [Programming VSTO Add-Ins](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins).
